feed.title: Christian on Security
feed.subtitle: Explore my professional profile, blog, and projects in cybersecurity, tech policy, and federal service

entry.title: Things to Come
entry.summary: Hello world! This is my first post on my Github pages site using Jekyll's "Chirpy" theme. Getting a custom domain in place and customizing the site code a bit was easier than I expected! This came after a few hours of struggling to get a Blogger site to look how I wanted. What a horrid platform! Glad I found this, and it's serendipitous because I plan to use Github on some homelab projects, all...
